section.title: Systemwartung
section.para: System Maintenance give the option to schedule one or more maintenance periods for the system. During this period no agents or customers can login into the system (except for Agents in the "admin" group). Current logged users and customers receive a notification about the maintenance (before and during the maintenance period). Administrators have the option to kill the sessions for logged agents and customers, all this in preparation to be able to make changes in the system (e.g. a system update) in a "safe" environment.

figure.title: The system maintenance overview screen with some scheduled periods

section.para: The Start Date and the Stop Date are required fields, and the only rule for this combination is that Start Date can not be a date after the Stop Date.

Nachdem eine neue Wartungszeit angelegt wurde, wird eine Übersicht mit Details über aktive Sessions angezeigt, in der Administratoren einzelne oder alle Sessions (außer der aktuellen) beenden können wenn das benötigt ist.
